features: 『2.4A Dual Port USB Charger Block』Dual USB multi-port output, which can charge two devices at high speed at the same time (Qualcomm fast charge is not supported), total output current 2.4A/5V, input 100-240V, single port maximum output 2.4A , the charging speed can be 10%-20% faster than 2.1A charger. It is convenient for travel and family use.

『Apple MFi Certified Lightning Protection Cable』The Dual Port 12W Wall Charger Block USB-C lightning protection cable with Apple MFi chip with automatic chip identification function. Apple MFi certification ensures 100% perfect compatibility with Apple devices. No more trigger warning messages.

『Safe & Efficient Fast Charging』The USB Plug for iPhone has a built-in multiple protection system to avoid over-voltage, over-charging, over-heating, etc. The length is convenient for use when charging and syncing at home/office/in bed, hotel Room and other places to travel.

『Applicable Apple Devices』Use the official iPhone 12 lightning cable and the square and compact Charger Cube to access the fast charging XS of iPhone 13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max /11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/ XS Max / XR / X 8 Plus, iPad, iPad Pro iPad mini iPad Air. This 2.4A FAST charger can also charge iPhone 7 6 Plus, iPhone 5 5c 5s SE Airpod at the original charging speed.

『18 Months Service』2pack 6ft lightning cable and 2pack 2.4A dual port usb wall charger, we provide 18 months of friendly customer service. If you have any questions, please contact us, we will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: >>FAST DATA TRANSFER & 3.0 TIMES FAST CHARGING<< Advanced fast charging technology supports up to 12W 2.4A power output, charging the new iPhone 12 at 3 times the speed of a 5W charger, which can save you more than 1.5 hours!

Suitable for Different Occasions even if you are sitting in the back seat of a car, the iPhone charger cable is long enough to conveniently charge devices in the bedroom, sofa, office, and traveling. The perfect alternative to high-performance Apple original USB cables -All products are of good quality and you can work at ease -Power Supply is easy to fit and remove Kitminun 12W 2.4A Dual Port USB Wall Plug Charger & Apple Original USB to iPhone Lightning Cable Material: fireproof PC material. Input: AC 100~240V 50/60Hz Output: 5V/2.4A 12W Size: 2.36*1.53*0.98 inch Weight: 1.3oz (38g) Cable: 6FT Lightning Cable *2 Color: White Package Content: 2 x Dual Port USB Charger Adapter 2 x 2m/6ft Lightning Cables

Kitminun 12W 2.4A Dual Port USB Wall Plug Charger & Apple USB to iPhone Lightning Cable 2.4A Dual Port USB Charger Block Dual USB multi-port output, which can charge two devices at high speed at the same time, total output current 2.4A/5V, input 100-240V, single port maximum output 2.4A . It is convenient for travel and family use. Portable & Safe The wall charger for iPhone has a built-in multiple protection system to avoid over-voltage, over-charging, over-heating, etc. Provide you with the safest protection. And this charger is super lightweight, ensuring maximum portability no matter where you want to go. The Newest C94 Connector High Quality Apple Charging Cable,trickle Charging Does Not Hurt the Phone.Cable was produced by C94(Apple PD Quick-Charge).No fear of Rust and Breakage ends.

Revolutionary Durability Cables The lightning cables have ergo-nomic unibody connectors with tactile cabling, strong construction of the lightning charger is contribute to withstand your daily wear and tear but also keep strong. High Quality This 2.4A fast charger adopts excellent safety IC design, and has over-current protection, over-voltage protection, over-heat protection and short-circuit protection. When your iPhone is fully charged, it will automatically turn off, greatly increasing your convenience. Intelligent Chip, Efficient & Safe Automatic matching of charging power. The Chips ensure a maximum current to 2.4A and transfer data up to 480Mb/s Save your time and protect your devices.

Broad Compatibility Compatible with all 8-Pin Lightning Devices. -iPhone 12/ iPhone 12 pro/ iPhone 12 pro Max/iPhone 12 mini -iPhone 11/ iPhone 11 pro/ iPhone 11 pro Max/ -iPhone xr/ iPhone xs/ xs max/ iPhone x/ iPhone 10/ -iPhone 8s Plus/ iPhone 8/ iPhone 7/ iPhone 7 plus/ -iPhone 6s Plus/ iPhone 6s/ iPhone 6/ iPhone 6 plus/ -iPhone 5s / iPhone 5c / iPhone 5/ iPhone SE/ iPhone SE 2th -Airpods / Airpods 2th gen/ Airpods Pro It’s compatible with the lastest iOS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again!
reviews.reviewText: These chargers work great. They are long so can charge and use easy at same time. I like the dual ports so can charge something else at same time. The quality seems really good. I think they are great deal to get 2 for what you would pay for one in stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this two-pack so I could give one to my mom and one to keep in my car. They work well. The cord is actually very long (maybe just a little too long for my car, but I don't mind.) Good quality...no issues so far. GREAT price for a two-pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and deal!
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent quality and certainly worth the cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived On Time
reviews.reviewText: No problems. Perfect for my IPAD and IPhone 12!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Not all iPhone chargers/cords work well for some reason. It seems the longer the cord, the shorter amount of time they continue to do the job. These, so far, are working well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exactly described by seller. Was delivered quickly. They seem to charge at a very fast rate. I love the long length of the cord. 10 feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Charges very quickly
reviews.reviewText: No false advertising here. They charge very quickly. The ten foot length makes it easy to use anywhere.
